name: Pro Quarterback
overview: WARNING: THIS GAME IS TOO REAL PRO QUARTERBACK is guts & glory football played as a professional would! From the kick-off to the final gun, you have to be quick, smart and tough to win. - Break the huddle into a dramatic, 3-D perspective down the field! - 26 Professional teams, stats track each player's performance, 6 different field conditions and realistic sound! For 1 or 2 players! - You select the players from either side of the ball using the playbook's long list of offensive or defensive plays! - Team up with a friend, go head-to-head or play against the computer! IT DOESN'T GET ANY MORE REALISTIC!
